abstract: On Tuesday, Bill Gates will introduce new software to integrate communications by voice, video and instant messaging.
snippet: On Tuesday, Bill Gates will introduce new software to integrate communications by voice, video and instant messaging.
lead_paragraph: For Cisco, Nortel, Avaya and the other companies that make telecommunications equipment, this Tuesday is a sort of D-Day.

headline.main: Bill Gates Presents the One (Really Big) Ringy Dingy
